VEC.Q: How many slices are there in this pie chart?
VEC.A: There are {6} slices in this pie chart.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the clockwise direction from slice Commercial Rentals?
SRP.A: The next slice clockwise from slice Commercial Rentals is {Vacation Rentals}.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the counterclockwise direction from slice Commercial Rentals?
SRP.A: The next slice counterclockwise from slice Commercial Rentals is {Storage Rentals}.

VPR.Q: Which rental has the largest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The rental with the largest proportion is {Car Rentals}.

VPR.Q: Which rental has the smallest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The rental with the smallest proportion is {Equipment Rentals}.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Equipment Rentals slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Equipment Rentals slice is {10}%.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Commercial Rentals slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Commercial Rentals slice is {15}%.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Event Space Rentals slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Event Space Rentals slice is {18}%.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in this pie chart?
What is the minimum value in this pie chart?

SC.Q: What is the difference between the values of Car Rentals and Storage Rentals in this pie chart?
SC.A: The difference between Car Rentals and Storage Rentals is {8}%.

SC.Q: What is the sum of the values of Equipment Rentals and Event Space Rentals in this pie chart?
SC.A: The sum of Equipment Rentals and Event Space Rentals is {28}%.

NF.Q: Which categories in the pie chart exceed 20.25%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
NF.A: {Car Rentals} accounts for {22}% and {Vacation Rentals} accounts for {21}%

NF.Q: Which categories in the pie chart are below 14.25%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
NF.A: {Storage Rentals} accounts for {14}% and {Equipment Rentals} accounts for {10}%

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Car Rentals, Vacation Rentals, Event Space Rentals, or Storage Rentals?
NC.A: The value of {Car Rentals} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Car Rentals or Vacation Rentals?
NC.A: The value of {Car Rentals} is larger.

MSR.Q: How many sectors have a percentage between 10% and 20%?
MSR.A: There are {4} sectors that have a percentage between 10% and 20%.

MSR.Q: Which three sectors have a sum of percentage less than 45%? List all possible combinations.
MSR.A: The possible combinations are: {(Event Space Rentals, Commercial Rentals, Equipment Rentals), (Event Space Rentals, Storage Rentals, Equipment Rentals), (Commercial Rentals, Storage Rentals, Equipment Rentals)}.
